name: Carolay Meza
description: visionary and disruptive, Carolay Meza leads digital transformation with empathy and creativity, leveraging technology as a bridge to progress. Her mission goes beyond innovation—she strives to create real opportunities for talented and determined individuals, proving that business growth and social impact can go hand in hand. With a bold and strategic mindset, she drives solutions that not only optimize businesses but also change lives. Because for her, where there’s a will, there’s a way.
